# PHProjectAssetElement

**Class**

An element that represents a media asset within project section content.

## Declaration

```swift
class PHProjectAssetElement
```

## Overview

Access the underlying [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/Photos/PHAsset] by converting the provided [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/PhotosUI/PHProjectSectionContent/cloudAssetIdentifiers] to a [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/Photos/PHAssetResource/assetLocalIdentifier], then calling [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/Photos/PHAsset/fetchAssets(withLocalIdentifiers:options:)].

## Characterizing an Asset Element

- **annotation**: A string annotation attached to the asset.
- **cloudAssetIdentifier**: The asset’s identifier in the cloud.
- **cropRect**: A rectangle defining the cropped portion of the asset.
- **regionsOfInterest**: An array of regions of interest in the photo asset.
- **horizontallyFlipped**: A Boolean indicating whether the asset is vertically flipped.
- **verticallyFlipped**: A Boolean indicating whether the asset is vertically flipped.

## Subclassing Project Elements

- **PHProjectTextElement**: An element that represents text within project section content.
- **PHProjectJournalEntryElement**: An element that represents a journal entry within project section content.
- **PHProjectMapElement**: An element that represents a map within project section content.

## Inherits From

- PHProjectElement

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCoding
- NSObjectProtocol
- NSSecureCoding
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
